title: As an EBIS User I would like to be able to see/modify player profiles even if BAMStats is down
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BAMStats is down (calls receiving any response other than a 3xx)
AND a user is logged in and navigating around EBIS
custom_steps: WHEN user attempt to view or edit a player profile
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view or edit profiles with no errors or other issues

title: Add June 30th Option to As Of Date Prompt on Payroll Comp Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with perms for the Payroll Comparison Report
custom_expected:
THEN June 30th will be available as an As Of prompt
AND if this option is selected the report should run based on June 30th payroll report/rosters

title: As a User, I want to see a 40-Man Flag Added to the Social Media Consent Report
custom_preconds:
Report Details:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Social+Media+Consent+Report+-+Report+Detail
GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to run the Social Media Consent report
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a new 40-Man column added to the Social Media Consent Report
AND if the player is currently on the 40-Man Roster, "Yes" should be displayed
BUT if the player is not currently on the 40-Man Roster, "No" should be displayed

title: As a New WLP User, I want the Login Screen to have a link to Self Reg on Inside MLB
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to sign up for access to WLP
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the login screen for the Winter League Portal (https://winterleagues.mlb.com/)
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a "Sign Up" link
AND the "Sign Up" link should direct users to this URL:
https://inside.mlb.com/UserRegistrationForm/?GROUP=WinterLeagues
(this previously directed users to the old clubhouse URL, it should now use the inside mlb url above)
